images.description: As drivers arrived the whole paddock knew this race weekend would be different
Even the Elvises knew there was a change in the vibe
It's the first Las Vegas F1 race in the city since 1982
The usual light show was expected
A random manhole causing damage to cars and chaos during Friday practice, less so
The celebrity guestlist seemed endless, including Terry Crews and Usain Bolt
Donny Osmond was working - singing the US national anthem
Drivers gambled on the super-fast circuit
Some, like Lando Norris, lost out
It was an eventful race, with Verstappen penalised for this early pass on Leclerc
But the outcome was the same: Champion Verstappen - who appeared to borrow a race suit from the Elvises - took victory
